original_text: “Suppose one of you has a servant plowing or looking after the sheep. Will he say to the servant when he comes in from the field, ‘Come along now and sit down to eat’?
korean_text: 너희 중 누구에게 밭을 갈거나 양을 치거나 하는 종이 있어 밭에서 돌아오면 그더러 곧 와 앉아서 먹으라 말할 자가 있느냐

sentences.original_text: Suppose one of you has a servant
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 누가 종을 가졌다고 하자

sentences.original_text: plowing or looking after the sheep
Will he say to the servant
when he comes in from the field
Come along now and sit down to eat
